how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/cexplorer.io/main/examples/meta.json

about.me: ASYは音楽とアート、人々をCNFTでつなぎ、Cardanoコミュニティに文化と笑顔を広げ、子どもたちの芸術と笑顔を支えます。ASY connects music, art, and people through CNFT - supporting the Cardano community with creativity.
about.server: 16 core 32GB RAM HomeServer, 12 vCPU 32GB RAM Servers
